name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Sugar - Tone, Language, Fav Chats

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Your ChatGPT Experience with ChatGPT Sugar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(private beta) 

ChatGPT Sugar: Elevate your ChatGPT sessions with this powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing and chatting experience. 

Features include:
- Multiple Output Styles: Select from short or long text responses based on your preference.
 -Tone Customisation: Choose the tone of ChatGPT’s output to match your communication style.
- Language Settings: Easily switch between different languages for ChatGPT’s responses.
- Starred Links: Quickly access your favorite ChatGPT conversations with our bookmarking feature.

Perfect for users seeking a more tailored and efficient interaction with ChatGPT.
